scripts.set-flyway-dev: sed -i 's/<PGUSER>/postgresUser/' flyway/flyway.conf && sed -i 's/<PGPASSWORD>/postgresPasswort/' flyway/flyway.conf && sed -i 's/<PGDATABASE>/peopledb/' flyway/flyway.conf && sed -i 's/<PGPORT>/6432/' flyway/flyway.conf && sed -i 's/<PGHOST>/localhost/' flyway/flyway.conf
scripts.start-dev: PGUSER=postgresUser PGHOST=localhost PGPASSWORD=postgresPasswort PGDATABASE=peopledb PGPORT=6432 node src/main/index.js
scripts.test-in-pipeline: PGUSER=<PIPELINE_PGUSER> PGHOST=<PIPELINE_PGHOST> PGPASSWORD=<PIPELINE_PGPASSWORD> PGDATABASE=<PIPELINE_PGDATABSE> PGPORT=<PIPELINE_PGPORT> jest --coverage --collectCoverageFrom='./src/main/**'
